attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The olympic logo is an embaressment to our country, near enough the whole country wanted this, and now you ruin it by making a logo that looks like a 5 year old drew it. There are far better ones. The worst thing about it though is you paied £400,000 for it (tax payers money may i add) For our counties sake please change it!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
